quests.objective: [solo] Solo mode with adaptive escalation - DONE
quests.note: Implemented haiku→sonnet→opus escalation, comprehensive verification, feedback loop

quests.objective: [bug] Fix intel.txt parser - should skip Archive section and HTML comments
[bug] Surrender should clear inventory.json so status shows 'No active raid'
[bug] SDK cwd option not isolating agent file operations - agents write to process.cwd() not worktree
[solo] Track token usage in solo mode - log tokens per attempt for cost visibility
[solo] Add --dry-run flag to solo command - show complexity assessment without executing
[solo] Add spell check to verification - pnpm spell as optional verification step
[ux] Fix status flicker - atomic state file writes to prevent partial reads during watch
[portability] Add support for external repos - undercity should work on any repo, not just itself
[portability] Add 'undercity init' command to initialize .undercity/ and intel.txt in a new repo
[metrics] Log to .undercity/metrics.jsonl - queryable history of quest durations, token usage, model escalations
[metrics] Track success rate per complexity level - which tasks need escalation most?
[grind] Improve grind command - better quest selection, skip already-complete, priority ordering
[parallel] Add parallel solo mode - run multiple solo tasks on different branches concurrently
[tui] Build a TUI dashboard - combine status display and streaming logs in one view
[qol] Add config file support (.undercityrc) for default options like --stream, model choices
run typecheck
[setup] Add 'undercity setup-ollama' command - detect hardware, recommend models, pull them, test they work
[parallel] Add parallel-by-tier execution - batch local-tools, run 2-3 local LLM, serialize Claude API calls for max throughput
[skynet] Build self-improvement loop - metrics collection, experiment framework, PM agent that generates improvement quests based on empirical data
[distributed] Build undercity hive - worker daemons on multiple machines, capability discovery, distributed task routing across home network
[metrics] Add metrics collector - track success/fail, time, tokens, model, escalations per task in .undercity/metrics.jsonl
[metrics] Add 'undercity metrics' command - show success rate by tier, avg time, token usage, top failure patterns
[metrics] Track routing accuracy - did the routed tier succeed or need escalation? Log prediction vs actual
[experiment] Add experiment framework - A/B test routing decisions, log variant and outcome
[experiment] Add 'undercity experiment' command - define hypothesis, run N trials, compare results
[pm] Add PM agent - weekly review of metrics, identify worst-performing task types, generate improvement hypotheses
[pm] PM generates quests - turn hypotheses into concrete improvement quests with expected impact
[pm] Add 'undercity improve' command - trigger PM analysis and quest generation on demand
[dogfood] Add before/after validation - measure metrics before change, apply change, measure after, auto-rollback if worse
[dogfood] Add 'undercity benchmark' command - run standard task set to measure baseline performance
[learning] Store successful prompts/approaches per task type - build institutional knowledge
[learning] Add prompt tuning - PM identifies low-success prompts, generates improvements, A/B tests them
[learning] Evaluate DSPy for prompt optimization - once we have metrics data, assess if prompt quality is the bottleneck vs routing/model selection, add DSPy if warranted
[integration] Wire grind to use git worktrees - each parallel task gets isolated worktree, merge via elevator queue
[integration] Parallel grind workers - spawn N workers, each in own worktree, coordinate via shared state
[integration] Merge queue for parallel grind - workers complete tasks, queue for serial merge (rebase, test, merge)
[integration] Conflict detection - if two workers touch same files, flag before merge attempt
fix typo - add a test comment in logger.ts
[experiment] Test local LLM code generation - try having Ollama generate diffs for simple edits, apply them locally, measure success rate vs haiku
